backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining surgery case types, user profiles, authorization checks, and CRUD functions for creating and retrieving cases.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata report linking a deployment-trigger feature to its associated file, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of multiple frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the root div and main TypeScript module.
frontend/public/deploy-retry.txt: Timestamp marker file used to trigger a redeploy or backend canister restart.
frontend/scripts/generateProjectFilesMan: Node script that scans the project, filters files, and writes a manifest JSON listing all included file paths.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring router, auth initialization, role provisioning, and unauthenticated login screen.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling II authentication, logout cleanup, and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Empty file placeholder for profile setup modal component.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Form component for creating or editing surgery cases with validation, autofill, and MRN-based duplicate detection.
frontend/src/components/cases/QuickAddDe: UI for parsing and applying demographics from pasted text or OCR via camera, with editable parsed fields.
frontend/src/components/cases/ToDoSectio: Manages a case-specific to‑do list with add, toggle, and delete operations using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/debug/DebugPanel: Debug interface showing identity, actor status, role info, case counts, and project files with refresh and copy actions.
frontend/src/components/debug/ProjectFil: Displays and filters project file paths, supports copying filtered lists, and handles loading or error states.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with navigation, footer, offline sync listener, and toggleable debug panel.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Top navigation bar showing app title, login status, offline indicator, and optional debug button.
frontend/src/components/offline/OfflineS: UI component showing online/offline status, pending offline changes, and controls for syncing or viewing queued operations.
Loads pending offline operations on mount to initialize offline sync state.
frontend/src/components/offline/PendingC: Dialog listing queued offline operations with metadata and actions to retry, remove, or clear all.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRoleDebug.ts: Fetches and polls the caller's backend role for debugging when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureUserRoleProv: Automatically ensures logged-in users receive the user role, retrying with limits and showing errors if provisioning fails.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout, and identity loading via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using window events.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineSync.ts: Manages syncing queued offline operations to the backend actor and updates operation statuses accordingly.
frontend/src/hooks/useProjectFilesManife: Loads and validates the build's project-files-manifest.json using React Query and returns its metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useProvisioningStatus: Tracks provisioning progress for the current identity, including retries, timing, and success or timeout state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating case data with offline caching and queued operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and light/dark theme CSS variables for the app's color system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CaseDetailPage.tsx: Displays and edits a single case with offline fallback, update/delete actions, and form-driven UI.
frontend/src/pages/CaseListPage.tsx: Lists, filters, sorts, imports, and exports cases with offline-awareness and navigation to case details.
frontend/src/pages/NewCasePage.tsx: Renders the new case creation page, handling form submission, offline behavior, and navigation.
frontend/src/types/offlineOps.ts: Defines TypeScript types for queued offline operations such as creating, updating, and deleting cases and todos.
frontend/src/utils/caseMatching.ts: Provides a helper to find the most recent case by MRN using arrivalDate and id sorting.
frontend/src/utils/dateTime.ts: Utility functions for converting between backend bigint timestamps, Date objects, and YYYY-MM-DD strings.
frontend/src/utils/demographicsParser.ts: Parses free‑text demographics into structured fields like MRN, names, dates, species, and breed, returning found, missing, and uncertain data.
frontend/src/utils/icStoppedCanisterErro: Detects stopped‑canister errors, extracts canister IDs, and provides explanation and suggested actions.
frontend/src/utils/logoutCleanup.ts: Clears offline cache and queued operations during logout, returning success status and any errors.
frontend/src/utils/ocrText.ts: Performs client‑side OCR using the TextDetector API, returning extracted text or error details.
frontend/src/utils/offlineDb.ts: Manages IndexedDB storage for case lists, individual case data, and offline operation queues.
frontend/src/utils/offlineQueue.ts: Handles enqueueing, retrieving, updating, and clearing offline operations in IndexedDB.
frontend/src/utils/safeErrorMessage.ts: Converts unknown error values into safe displayable strings using several fallback strategies.
Parses CSV rows for surgery cases, handling headers, booleans, species/sex enums, quoted fields, and to‑do parsing with error reporting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, backend outage issues, and a feature to trigger redeployment by updating a retry marker file.
